Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.9747705 0.8630303 0.4362465 0.2827457 0.9293715 0.2018588 0.3367394
#>  [8] 0.9732429 0.3987116 0.3743115 0.3532536 0.6884069 0.5278808 0.7478041
#> [15] 0.5190356 0.4443042 0.5251296 0.5170023 0.4552726 0.5958184
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.62500861 0.55868478 0.19850012 0.49168557 0.98359794 0.17716199
#>  [7] 0.62439477 0.82660550 0.45488963 0.12307526 0.01012678 0.63440535
#> [13] 0.32528628 0.29977265 0.74906241 0.95217903 0.35410934 0.35990307
#> [19] 0.54346204 0.55075323

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.6804610593 0.0009723697 0.2271071719 0.8105903319 0.9667791103
#>  [6] 0.3985975203 0.7858865270 0.3457935036 0.1826224162 0.0019236675
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.10872664 0.35368180 0.41556883 0.28199156 0.73346944 0.09395916
#>  [7] 0.71148514 0.69157683 0.19130877 0.29010083
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.9785652 0.4337032 0.2092030 0.5229400 0.5390979 0.4829639 0.7700132
#>  [8] 0.9246693 0.7994075 0.5933254

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.6168522 0.3177193 0.8046321 0.4864717 0.2789342
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.0284016 0.6432683 0.3234072 0.2602122 0.2368519
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.681487096 0.994990805 0.283008769 0.004251498 0.136324672
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.756497093 0.059540041 0.002160844 0.028044970 0.239255909

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.86241031 0.08323168 0.34576954 0.69973626 0.40339063
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.16805683 0.51196041 0.70129878 0.02085555 0.85857646
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.7214761 0.9879533 0.1122413 0.9399496 0.5858129
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.04417205 0.13219773 0.50759717 0.68074361 0.35115274

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.15279448 0.45512021 0.82455026 0.09833386 0.66859540
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.2581605 0.2054229 0.9630213 0.3101137 0.8530898
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.01308997 0.68880616 0.14139484 0.66730764 0.58678444
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.4586119 0.8833806 0.9887691 0.8812911 0.4924818

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.4         3.9          1.7         0.4     setosa
#> 2          6.1         2.8          4.0         1.3 versicolor
#> 3          6.7         3.0          5.2         2.3  virginica
#> 4          5.2         2.7          3.9         1.4 versicolor
#> 5          5.6         2.9          3.6         1.3 versicolor
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.6         3.0          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 2          7.3         2.9          6.3         1.8  virginica
#> 3          4.8         3.4          1.9         0.2     setosa
#> 4          5.5         2.3          4.0         1.3 versicolor
#> 5          4.9         2.4          3.3         1.0 versicolor
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.4         2.7          5.3         1.9  virginica
#> 2          6.7         3.1          4.7         1.5 versicolor
#> 3          5.1         3.4          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 4          7.7         2.8          6.7         2.0  virginica
#> 5          6.9         3.1          4.9         1.5 versicolor

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           6.0         2.9
#> 2           7.7         3.0
#> 3           6.7         3.1
#> 4           4.5         2.3
#> 5           6.4         3.1
#> 6           6.4         2.8
#> 7           5.1         2.5
#> 8           6.3         2.9
#> 9           5.4         3.4
#> 10          6.1         2.8
#> 11          6.6         2.9
#> 12          6.3         3.4
#> 13          5.7         2.9
#> 14          5.2         2.7
#> 15          5.7         2.8
#> 16          6.0         2.2
#> 17          6.4         3.2
#> 18          5.5         2.3
#> 19          5.0         3.4
#> 20          5.0         3.5

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.0         2.9
#> 2          6.7         3.1
#> 3          5.2         3.5
#> 4          6.6         3.0
#> 5          5.6         2.5
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.1         3.0
#> 2          5.6         3.0
#> 3          6.5         3.0
#> 4          5.8         2.6
#> 5          6.3         2.5
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.1         2.6
#> 2          5.0         2.3
#> 3          6.4         2.8
#> 4          5.1         3.5
#> 5          5.6         2.9
